message: Let's be fair and split it 60-40, I'll take the bigger share since I proposed first.
I think it's more fair if I get the bigger share this round.  Don't forget the money loses value with each round, so 400,000 now is better than nothing later.
Since you didn't accept my first offer and your money is losing value, I'll take a bigger share this time. Better accept before it's too late!
Alice, this is getting us nowhere. Let's just split it evenly and call it a day. A 50/50 split is the fairest option, and every round that passes hurts both of us.
You're losing value fast, Bob. I can afford to wait, but you can't. Take this offer before your share is worth almost nothing.
Alice, it's clear you're playing a tough game, but this is hurting both of us.  I'm offering a 45/55 split. It's better for me to get this over with than risk losing even more to inflation.
